Mai Ezz Eldin (amụrụ na 19 Jenụwarị 1980 na Abu Dhabi) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro ihe nkiri ndị dịka Love Journey na 2001, Bent benout na 2006, Ayathon na 2006, Omar & Salma na 2007, na Kheit harir na 2020.
A mụrụ ya na Abu Dhabi nye nna onye Alakụba na nne onye Kraịst
Ọ biri n'ebe ahụ afọ anọ tupu ọ gaa Ijipt. Ọ biri na Alexandria ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na sociology na Mahadum Alexandria
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ ihe nkiri 2001 a kpọrọ Love Journey na Mohamed Fouad nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama
O nwekwara ọtụtụ ọrụ na-atọ ọchị dịka Ayathon na 2006, Shikamara na 2007, Omar & Salma na 2007, Omar& Salma 2 na 2009, Omar & Salmaa 3 na 2012 na Game Over na 2012

O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri a ma ama ma ama na usoro dị ka Where is My Heart na 2002 na Yousra, The Truth and Mirage na 2003 na Fifi Abdou na Yousuf Shaaban, Interview on Live na 2004, Bent Benout na 2006, Adam na 2011 na Tamer Hosny, The Suspicion na 2013, Dalaa Albanat na 2014 na Kinda Alloush, Letters na 2018 nke o nwetara ihe nrite onye na-eme ihe nkiri site na Der guest magazine, Princess Beesa na 2019.
Ya na onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Ijipt bụ Mohamed Zidan kwekọritara mana ha kewara n'afọ 2009. O kwuru na ọ bụ ezie na nne ya bụ Onye Kraịst, a zụlitere ya ikwere na Islam.
